items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: Stunning dress. True to size. Read more
items.author: Lisa Baran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wedding guest dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Good quality material, well made dress. I ordered a medium and I need a large. If you are a true medium it is a good fit. I am between sizes. Read more
items.author: Martha Deese

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute overall, but not high quality.
items.body: Cute dress and beautiful color. The neckline is elegant and flattering as well. But the stitching is loose and not great quality and the buttons were also already loose when it arrived. Itâ€™s also not lined. Itâ€™s a nice dress, just ok quality, and therefore feels a bit overpriced. I also found it to run a tad in the small size. Iâ€™m a pretty standard medium but wish Iâ€™d sized up to a large so it laid more elegantly. Read more
items.author: Brittany Hartley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fall Wedding or Holiday Dress!
items.body: The best dress for a fall wedding or holiday gathering... Satin is great quality. Fits well. At 5'3" and 128, the medium was a great fit. The navy is stunning! Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Silhouette with a Soft Satin Feel
items.body: This satin dress has a beautiful sheen and looks polished for an event or dinner. The mock neck and long sleeves balance the short length well. The fit runs slightly small in the bust, so consider sizing up for comfort. Great for fall weddings or semi-formal gatherings. Read more
items.author: V Quance

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful rose-satin short dress!
items.body: This beautiful rose-colored satin short dress is elegant, chic, and stunning, and the texture of the fabric is so soft and silky to the touch, accenting your curves gracefully. The cowl neck is not over exaggerated, and complements the style of the dress itself. The sleeves are very poufy, and compete with both the bodice and soft cowl neck design, but I still love this dress, and feel that with the right accessories, the dress will be a great addition to your formal wardrobe. I also love the keyhole design in the back of the dress. The craftsmanship and attention to detail is evident in the styling of this dress, which is sure to become a staple in your wardrobe. A great value for the price and a classic style dress, perfect for the upcoming holiday season ahead! Read more
items.author: Tb

The quality is excellent â€” the material feels luxe and smooth with just the right amount of sheen to make it feel elegant but not over the top. For reference, Iâ€™m 5'2", 145 lbs, 38C bust, and the medium fits like a dream â€” it's fitted without being tight, and the length hits just right, giving a classy but flirty vibe. Itâ€™s short enough to feel fun but still appropriate for formal or semi-formal occasions. The mock neck and long sleeves give it that chic, polished look, perfect for fall and winter events. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition â€” no weird smell or wrinkles out of the package. I love that itâ€™s lightweight but lined well, so it doesnâ€™t cling or show too much. Itâ€™s the perfect dress for upcoming holiday parties, weddings, or cocktail nights. Add some statement earrings and heels, and youâ€™re good to go! If you're looking for a sleek and classy dress that hugs in all the right places, this oneâ€™s a winner! Iâ€™ll definitely be eyeing other colors. ðŸ¥‚ðŸ’ƒ Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant... With poofy sleeves
items.body: It looks as pictured. It's cute and elegant, but personally my shoulders look a bit broad because of the poofy shoulders/sleeves Read more
items.author: jane

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Coffee White Polka Dots, Floral Navy Blue, Brown, Aa Green, Ab Peacock Blue, Aa Black, Ab Navy Blue, Rose, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
